list.name: Commit
list.query: SELECT * FROM events WHERE event = 'UI_COMMIT_COMPLETED' AND $timeFilter

targets.query: select mean(value) from /($host_regex).chassis.routing-engine.*.cpu-idle/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).chassis.routing-engine.*.memory-buffer-utilization/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).re.system.buffers.in_use.current_mbuf/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).re.system.buffers.clusters_in_use.current_mbuf_clusters/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).route-table.summary.inet.0.actives/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).route-table.summary.inet.3.actives/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).route-table.summary.bgp.l3vpn.0.actives/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).route-table.summary.inet.0.hidden/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).route-table.summary.inet.3.hidden/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).route-table.summary.bgp.l3vpn.0.hidden/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).re.memory.rpd-SIZE/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).re.memory.cosd-SIZE/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).re.memory.dfwd-SIZE/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).re.memory.dcd-SIZE/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).re.memory.mib2d-SIZE/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).re.memory.snmpd-SIZE/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).re.memory.smid-SIZE/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).re.memory.smihelperd-SIZE/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).re.memory.sampled-SIZE/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(value),1s) from /($host_regex).pfe-general-stats.aggregated.pfe-local-traffic-stats.pfe-.*-packets/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(value),1s) from /($host_regex).pfe-general-stats.aggregated.pfe-local-traffic-stats.hardware-input-drops/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(value),1s) from /($host_regex).pfe-general-stats.aggregated.pfe-local-traffic-stats.software-input-control-drops/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(value),1s) from /($host_regex).pfe-general-stats.aggregated.pfe-local-traffic-stats.software-input-high-drops/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(value),1s) from /($host_regex).pfe-general-stats.aggregated.pfe-local-traffic-stats.software-input-medium-drops/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(value),1s) from /($host_regex).pfe-general-stats.aggregated.pfe-local-traffic-stats.software-input-low-drops/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(value),1s) from /($host_regex).pfe-general-stats.aggregated.pfe-traffic-stats.pfe-.*-packets/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).pfe-general-stats.aggregated.pfe-traffic-stats.*-pps/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(value),1s) from /($host_regex).pfe-general-stats.aggregated.pfe-hardware-discards-stats.bits-to-test-discard/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(value),1s) from /($host_regex).pfe-general-stats.aggregated.pfe-hardware-discards-stats.data-error-discard/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(value),1s) from /($host_regex).pfe-general-stats.aggregated.pfe-hardware-discards-stats.stack-underflow-discard/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(value),1s) from /($host_regex).pfe-general-stats.aggregated.pfe-hardware-discards-stats.stack-overflow-discard/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(value),1s) from /($host_regex).pfe-general-stats.aggregated.pfe-hardware-discards-stats.bad-route-discard/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(value),1s) from /($host_regex).pfe-general-stats.aggregated.pfe-hardware-discards-stats.timeout-discard/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(value),1s) from /($host_regex).pfe-general-stats.aggregated.pfe-hardware-discards-stats.truncated-key-discard/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).fpc.slot.*.resource.used-heap-mem-percent/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).fpc.slot.*.pfe.*.resource.used-ifl-counter-percent/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).fpc.slot.*.pfe.*.resource.used-filter-counter-percent/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
SELECT mean("delta") from /($host_regex).snmp-.*-packets/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("delta") from /($host_regex).snmp-input-get-nexts/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(value),1s) from /($host_regex).protocols.isis.statistics.Totals.packets-sent/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)

select mean(value) from /($host_regex).protocols.bgp.summary.group-count/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).protocols.bgp.summary.down-peer-count/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
